website_summaries.verdict: A sleek and flexible set of hurdles that you won't have to reset every time someone knocks one over.
pros: Bounce-back design automatically resets the hurdles if they fall over
Flexible design to prevent breaking if they're stepped on
cons: The sides of the hurdles are not as flexible as the middle, so if you step on these, they may break

customer_reviews.title: Step, crackle and pop.
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old girl stepped on one while working agility drills for softball and it snapped. Not worth the money if it can't even handle a 10 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Use these for a team with athletes as young as 3 and as old 14. Everyone enjoys them and they are standing up so far. We have been using them a couple times a week for a couple months. The carry bag is large enough for the hurdles, a stack of cones and an agility ladder. Lightweight enough, I make me six year old carry it all
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fitness During Covid-19
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helpful in providing my family with activities during Covid. They are durable and helps you with agility. They tend to fall over rather easily, but they are durable. Definitely appears to be assisting my 11 year old daughter with her foot speed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Overall they're are a fantastic product to help any athlete become quicker and more ...
customer_reviews.text: Only one broke out of 12 that I purchased. I coach youth player and they stepped on them and landed on them and they were very flexible. The one that broke, the player landed on the side which does not have the same flex. Overall they're are a fantastic product to help any athlete become quicker and more athletic! Can be used indoors or outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: RollandUbi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I have had no problem with the durability of mine( I bought two). They get stepped in about every session.
customer_reviews.author: FLA48

customer_reviews.title: Nice for agility work
customer_reviews.text: Some hurdles we used previously are either discontinued or very fragile so tried these out. They're not to easy to store but they're great when you deal with all fitness levels which avoids having any \broken. These don't break.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. They do bend back if stepped on. However, land closer to the end than in the middle, and it will explode. I don't think it's a defect, just my girl landed on it in the most vulnerable spot. Other than that one hurdle, I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Roy

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, great for youth sports
customer_reviews.text: As a youth soccer coach, I like the fact that these can be stepped on and they will return to their original shape. These are light and can be used for any sports training - my freshman son uses them for football agility. I'm slowly becoming a fan of SKLZ brand - I used to dislike their brand based on quality but I think they're improving.
customer_reviews.author: Chai

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend,  great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are great. Great quality. My husband uses for all the sports he coaches
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: These hurdles are not durable, what-so-ever. While they do serve a good purpose, we have had 2 broken from them being stepped on while performing jumping exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to stand and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Got these hurdles for my girls' and boys' soccer teams. Very easy to stand and very durable. My 100+ pound daughter often misses a jump and lands on it, but the hurdle quickly rebounds back into shape. Best part is, it cost over 12 dollars less than Sports Authority.
customer_reviews.author: knocks

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Flemsy so they won't break if stepped on. Flemsy enough to have to kinda bend back in shape if heavily stepped on. Pick your poison. 6 inch is good for a beginner. If your child is a athletic preteen or teen who learns quick,you may want to just buy the adjustable ones. I'm having a little regret,thankfully I have a younger son also.
customer_reviews.author: Up&@em

customer_reviews.title: Ok for training and easy to pack away!
customer_reviews.text: Good for what they are used for! Really not that sturdy but ok for training!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Delmonico

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are so amazing. easy to use, sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Allison Leslie Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These have been great. A bit low to the ground but that is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... clients every other day and these hurdles hold up great. The bag they come with is convenient and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my clients every other day and these hurdles hold up great. The bag they come with is convenient and the hurdles bend when stepped on which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Truthbetold

customer_reviews.title: As expected...
customer_reviews.text: This is being used for lacrosse and agility training. It is awesome and comes with a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Dre C

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was using the hurdles today for only the 2nd time having my client working on lateral agility drills and he stepped on the hurdle and it snapped. The whole point of this hurdle is that it collapses when you step on it... I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert DiDonato

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these for his business and for himself ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these for his business and for himself. Although I do with I would have gotten him adjustable ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hurdles for a PT clinic
customer_reviews.text: These work well. I work in a PT clinic and we use these with patients. Hurdles can be stepped on and won't break. One annoyance is the rubber ends are easy to fall off which then lets the hurdle slide on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality as advertised. Did not break after being stepped on repeatedly.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I simply set themout and have an easy and effective drill to enhancespeed
customer_reviews.text: I lve these speed hurdles! I simply set themout and have an easy and effective drill to enhancespeed ,leg turnover .etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Puncsak

customer_reviews.title: These are great for any athlete out there
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time. They help with training and improving my stamina for soccer. I have had friends borrow these to help train in other sports as well. These are great for any athlete out there.
customer_reviews.author: Electronix Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Essential for speed work
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy product for any type of field training. Have been using for two months now and takes plenty of wear and tear from cleats and weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hurdles...now if I can get my kids to use them!
customer_reviews.author: G. griffin

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time that I have purchased these ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I have purchased these. I use them all of the time for my clients. The collapse ability of the hurdles makes them definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Damien C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well built and helping me a great time to coach my kids
customer_reviews.text: Well built and helping me a great time to coach my kids.
customer_reviews.author: esossai

customer_reviews.title: My niece would probably say anything I got her eas the best.
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for my 10 yr old niece. She says they are great and just what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Muro

customer_reviews.title: Great Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great equipment. Use wickets for track team (AAU-High School). Great for football, basketball, baseball, ect. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Louis A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! We use these for kids so getting hurt is avoided at all cost and these let you do just that!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like that they flex. Landed on a few times and never broke.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved those hurdles, they are great for agility training and they look very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amira Elshandidi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! And the price is cheaper than any sporting good store out there!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Use it a lot, good for ton of different exercises
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Great product will definitely be purchasing other training products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Chavez

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my high school team
customer_reviews.text: light weight and flexible, perfect for my high school team
customer_reviews.author: HHS_Trojan

customer_reviews.title: perfect for youth sport drills.
customer_reviews.text: Good value, good quality. Made of soft but sturdy plastic that gives if stepped on but bounces right back to keep shape. I would say good for kids up to age 11-12, maybe need higher ones when a teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O.

customer_reviews.title: Disformed after 2 weeks usage
customer_reviews.text: The hurdle is already twisted after 2 weeks of light usage with 3 players.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Hurdles
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed plastic hurdles. I use them to train for soccer.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: break easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these 1 month ago today. On the first use, one snapped. A second broke today. Total uses probably about 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for karate.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best addition to our karate school. Students love the new drills.
customer_reviews.author: GTiger17

customer_reviews.title: I may be ordering more in the near future
customer_reviews.text: The are perfect for the drills that I want my sprinters and jumpers to do to improve there running technique
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great in my physical therapy clinic. Flexible but not fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Stretch

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for foot work. My boys see it as a game. I have kids under 10yoa and they love the drills I set for them. It's about making it fun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for soccer training for my kids and it's really useful for different things
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to used it for soccer training for my kids and it's really useful for different things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Two middle infielders in our family. BOTH have improved footwork right away
customer_reviews.author: Burt L.

customer_reviews.title: Well made & great investment.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy for the teen boys I train. Great tool for agility and speed drills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product fast shipping love the bag they came in
customer_reviews.author: avjv

customer_reviews.title: very good training hurdles
customer_reviews.text: delivered as promised, product as described, very good training hurdles..
customer_reviews.author: Randy R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my youth football players. We still have to see about the endurance of these items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great training tool. They are well made and sturdy. My son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Reid

customer_reviews.title: Durable? Not at all...
customer_reviews.text: Durable is a bad description...the first day of using these, two hurdles broke. I am very disappointed in the quality of the product and hope to get a refund. These are not worth the money paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: SKLZ 6-Inch Ultra Durable Agility Hurdles, Set of 6
product_meta.description: The SKLZ 6X Hurdles set of six (6) is built to improve your speed, agility and power. Bring variety to your practice, workouts, and drills as you train harder and reach for impressive results. These tough and stable hurdles have innovative bounce back technology. They will withstand the rigors of intense workout sessions. These superiorly designed hurdles are built for speed, plyometrics, and agility. Develop strength and total body power as you work through sets and reps. Improve your overall athleticism around the court, field, or the track with SKLZ 6X Hurdles. SKLZ athletic equipment is just as strong as you are. SKLZ is dedicated to helping athletes of all levels reach their goals.
feature_bullets: EXPLOSIVE SPEED AND AGILITY. Generate power with these agility, and plyometric training hurdles. Bring your athletic performance to the next level as you build strength and explosive speed with the SKLZ 6X Hurdles.

INSTANT BOUNCE BACK. These hurdles have innovative back bounce construction, and maintain their shape, even after being used by the toughest athletes. Each hurdle offers a highly durable base with a low profile look for cleats of all sizes.

ULTRA DURABLE. The SKLZ 6X Hurdles are ultra-durable with a superior, one-piece twist design. At 6” high, they help to develop quick feet so you can output maximum power and footwork no matter your sport.

SET OF SIX (6) BREAKS DOWN SMALL. These lightweight, and low profile hurdles stand sturdy during practice, but break down small. They come in a convenient carrying bag, making the drills that much easier to set up and break down.

INVEST IN YOUR TRAINING. SKLZ is dedicated to helping athletes of all levels reach their goals. No matter your sport--baseball, soccer, football, or basketball--the SKLZ 6X Hurdles will help you reach peak performance around the field, court, or pitch.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
